recipes.name: Cheesy Apple Pancake Wraps
instructions: Step 1: Core and thinly slice the apples.
Step 2: Heat a pan and melt a tablespoon of butter. Add apple slices and cook until they are tender.
Step 3: Add a hint of cinnamon to apples if available.
Step 4: Warm the flour tortillas and spread cream cheese over them.
Step 5: Place the cooked apples over the cream cheese and drizzle with maple syrup.
Step 6: Roll the tortillas and serve warm.

recipes.name: Spicy Harissa Egg Salad
instructions: Step 1: Boil eggs until hard-boiled. Once cooled, peel and chop them.
Step 2: In a bowl, mix eggs with mayonnaise and harissa paste.
Step 3: Chop fresh parsley and incorporate it into the egg mixture.
Step 4: Toast some sunflower seeds and mix them into the salad for a crunchy texture.
Step 5: Serve the egg salad on a bed of mixed greens or between slices of bread.

recipes.name: Pear and Arugula Salad with Lemon Dressing
instructions: Step 1: Thinly slice the pears.
Step 2: In a bowl, combine fresh arugula, pear slices, and a handful of sunflower seeds.
Step 3: Toast almonds lightly to enhance their flavor, then mix them into the salad.
Step 4: Make a dressing by mixing freshly squeezed lemon juice, honey, and olive oil.
Step 5: Toss the salad with the dressing just before serving.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry Wraps
instructions: Step 1: Chop the mixed bell peppers, carrots, and red cabbage into strips.
Step 2: In a skillet, melt some butter and sauté all the vegetables until tender.
Step 3: Add a splash of soy sauce and minced garlic, stirring until vegetables are coated.
Step 4: Warm flour tortillas and fill them with the vegetable stir-fry.
Step 5: Serve immediately as wraps.

recipes.name: Minty Fruit and Cheese Platter
instructions: Step 1: Slice apples, pears, and bananas nicely.
Step 2: Cut block of cheddar cheese into cubes.
Step 3: Arrange fruits and cheese cubes on a platter.
Step 4: Sprinkle some fresh mint leaves over the platter.
Step 5: Optionally drizzle some honey over whole platter for sweetness.

recipes.name: Beet and Pickle Salad with Arugula and Mint
instructions: Step 1: Drain and chop pickles and marinated beets.
Step 2: In a salad bowl, mix the chopped pickles and beets with fresh arugula.
Step 3: Chop fresh mint leaves and add them into the salad.
Step 4: Make a simple dressing with freshly squeezed lime juice and olive oil.
Step 5: Toss the salad with dressing before serving.

recipes.name: Tomato Ketchup and Mustard Deviled Eggs
instructions: Step 1: Place eggs in a pot, cover with water, and boil until hard-boiled.
Step 2: Once cooled, peel the eggs and slice them in half.
Step 3: Scoop out the yolks into a bowl, mix them with mayonnaise, ketchup, and mustard.
Step 4: Spoon or pipe the yolk mixture back into the egg whites.
Step 5: Garnish with freshly chopped parsley and a sprinkle of paprika.
